bug.summary: omniNames service failed if no registry entries present
bug.text: If the omniNames Windows service was set up using an external tool, meaning it had none of its expected registry entries present, startup failed.

bug.summary: Incorrect behaviour handling exceptions on VC++ 7.1
bug.text: A bug in Visual C++ 7.1 meant it generated incorrect exception handling code, leading to strange errors and crashes if exceptions occurred in remote calls.

bug.summary: Incorrect enum name in IR IDL
bug.text: The dk_ValueMember enum member was misnamed dk_Member in ir.idl.

bug.summary: Failure if openening a connection fails with EAGAIN
bug.text: If opening a connection failed with EAGAIN, an incorrect while loop meant that the connection attempt was not properly retried.
